document.full_text: foxconn technology group, maker of apple inc's iphone and ipad, said it is looking at investment opportunities in brazil in line with its strategy of "being where the market is," a plan that would boost its presence in a fast-growing market for electronic devices.
document.title: foxconn says looking at investment opportunities in brazil
lines_and_colors: foxconn technology group, maker of apple inc's iphone and ipad, said it is looking at investment opportunities in brazil in line with its strategy of "being where the market is," a plan that would boost its presence in a fast-growing market for electronic devices.
